craftable.name: AdaptiveHelm
craftable.add_attrs:
Gain an additional 15% Mana from all sources. The wearer gains an additional bonus based on their Role:

Tanks and Fighters: Gain 35 Armor and Magic Resistance.

Other Roles: Gain 15 Attack Damage and Ability Power.

radiant.name: JakshotheProtean
radiant.add_attrs:
Gain an additional 30% Mana from all sources. The wearer gains an additional bonus based on their Role:

Tank/Fighter: Gain 60 Armor and Magic Resistance.

Marksman/Caster: Gain 30 Attack Damage and Ability Power.

craftable.name: ArcaneGauntlet
craftable.add_attrs:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

radiant.name: RadientJeweledGauntlet
radiant.add_attrs:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

craftable.name: Bloodthirster
craftable.add_attrs: Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 25% max Health Shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

radiant.name: RadientBloodthirster
radiant.add_attrs: Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 40% max Health Shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

craftable.name: BlueSentinel
craftable.add_attrs: A golem's essence, overflowing with arcane potential.

radiant.name: RadientBlueBuff
radiant.add_attrs: A blessing from the golem spirits, granting overflowing arcane energy.

craftable.name: BrambleVest
craftable.add_attrs:
Gain 7% max health.

Take 8% reduced damage from attacks. When struck by any attack, deal 100 magic damage to all adjacent enemies.

Cooldown: 2 seconds

radiant.name: RadientBrambleVest
radiant.add_attrs:
Gain 15% max health.

Take 25% reduced damage from attacks. When struck by any attack, deal 175 magic damage to all adjacent enemies.

Cooldown: 2 seconds

craftable.name: Crownguard
craftable.add_attrs:
Combat start: Gain a 25% max Health Shield for 8 seconds.
When the shield expires, gain 25 Ability Power.

radiant.name: CrownguardRadiant
radiant.add_attrs:
Combat start: Gain a 50% max Health Shield for 8 seconds.
When the shield expires, gain 50 Ability Power.

craftable.name: DragonsClaw
craftable.add_attrs:
Gain 9% max health.

Every 2 seconds, heal 2.5% max Health.

radiant.name: RadientDragonsClaw
radiant.add_attrs:
Gain 15% max health.

Every 2 seconds, heal 10% max Health.

craftable.name: Evenshroud
craftable.add_attrs:
30% Sunder enemies within 2 hexes. Gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 15 seconds of combat.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

radiant.name: EvenshroudRadiant
radiant.add_attrs:
30% Sunder enemies within 3 hexes. Gain 70 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 20 seconds of combat.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

craftable.name: Fimbulwinter
craftable.add_attrs:
Start of Combat: Gain 20 Mana.

Lifeline: At 40% Health, gain 15 Mana and a Shield equal to 20% max Health.

radiant.name: FimbulwinterRadiant
radiant.add_attrs:
Start of Combat: Gain 20 Mana.

Lifeline: At 40%% Health, gain 20 and a Shield equal to 45%% max Health.

craftable.name: GiantSlayer
craftable.add_attrs: Gain 15% additional Damage Amp against Tanks.

radiant.name: RadientGiantSlayer
radiant.add_attrs: Gain 25% additional Damage Amp against Tanks.

craftable.name: Guardbreaker
craftable.add_attrs: Critical Strikes grant 5% Damage Amp for 5 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.

radiant.name: RadientStridebreaker
radiant.add_attrs: Critical Strikes grant 8% Damage Amp for 8 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.

craftable.name: GuardianAngel
craftable.add_attrs: Lifeline: At 60% Health, briefly become untargetable and shed negative effects.

radiant.name: RadientEdgeofNight
radiant.add_attrs: Lifeline: At 60% Health, briefly become untargetable and shed negative effects.

craftable.name: GuinsoosRageblade
craftable.add_attrs: Gain 7% stacking Attack Speed every second.

radiant.name: RadientGuinsoosRageblade
radiant.add_attrs: Gain 14% stacking Attack Speed every second.

craftable.name: HandofJustice
craftable.add_attrs:
Gain 2 effects:
- 15% Attack Damage and 15 Ability Power.
- 12% Omnivamp.

While above 50% health, double the Attack Damage and Ability Power. While below 50% Health, double the Omnivamp.

radiant.name: RadientHandofJustice
radiant.add_attrs:
Gain 2 effects:
-35% Attack Damage and 35 Ability Power.
- 20% Omnivamp
While above 50% health, double the Attack Damage and Ability Power. While below 50% Health, double the Omnivamp.

craftable.name: HextechGunblade
craftable.add_attrs: Heal the lowest percent Health ally for 20% of damage dealt.

radiant.name: RadientHextechGunblade
radiant.add_attrs: Heal the lowest percent Health ally for 40% of damage dealt.

craftable.name: InfinityEdge
craftable.add_attrs:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

radiant.name: RadientInfinityEdge
radiant.add_attrs:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

craftable.name: IonicSpark
craftable.add_attrs:
30% Shred enemies within 2 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, deal magic damage equal to 160% of the Mana spent.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

radiant.name: RadientIonicSpark
radiant.add_attrs:
30% Shred enemies within 3 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, deal magic damage equal to 200% of the Mana spent..

Also, heal 1.5% max Health per second.

[Direct damage item]
Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

craftable.name: IronWill
craftable.add_attrs: Gain 10 Armor and 10 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

radiant.name: RadientGargoyleStoneplate
radiant.add_attrs:
Heal 1.5% max Health each second.

Gain 15 Armor and 15 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

craftable.name: LastWhisper
craftable.add_attrs:
Physical damage 30% Sunders the target for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

Sunder: reduce Armor

radiant.name: RadientLastWhisper
radiant.add_attrs:
Physical damage 30% Sunders the target for the rest of combat. This effect does not stack.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

craftable.name: LordsEdge
craftable.add_attrs: Perfect peace and calm for the holder - and all who face it.

radiant.name: RadientDeathblade
radiant.add_attrs: It glows in the presence of enemies. Or friends. Or anything alive, really.

craftable.name: LudensEcho
craftable.add_attrs: Combat start: Gain 30 Ability Power every 5 seconds in combat.

radiant.name: RadientArchangelsStaff
radiant.add_attrs: Combat start: Gain 40 Ability Power every 4 seconds in combat.

craftable.name: Morellonomicon
craftable.add_attrs:
Attacks and Abilities deal 1% Burn and 33% Wound to enemies for 10 seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

radiant.name: RadientMorellonomicon
radiant.add_attrs:
Attacks and Abilities deal 2% Burn and 33% Wound to enemies for 8 seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

craftable.name: NashorsTooth
craftable.add_attrs: After casting an Ability, gain 30% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

radiant.name: NashorsToothRadiant
radiant.add_attrs: After casting an Ability, gain 60% Attack Speed for 8 seconds.

craftable.name: Quicksilver
craftable.add_attrs:
Combat start: Gain immunity to crowd control for 18 seconds. During this time, gain 3% Attack Speed every 2 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

radiant.name: RadientQuicksilver
radiant.add_attrs:
Combat start: Gain immunity to crowd control for 45 seconds. For 18 seconds, gain 7% Attack Speed every 2 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

craftable.name: RabadonsDeathcap
craftable.add_attrs: This humble hat can help you make, or unmake, the world itself.

radiant.name: RadientRabadonsDeathcap
radiant.add_attrs: It's witnessed - and unleashed - miracles and calamities both.

craftable.name: RedBuffItem
craftable.add_attrs:
Attacks and Abilities 1% Burn and 33% Wound enemies for 5 seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

radiant.name: RadientRedBuff
radiant.add_attrs:
Attacks and Abilities 2% Burn and 33% Wound enemies for 5 seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

craftable.name: Redemption
craftable.add_attrs: Regenerate 2.5% of missing Health each second.

radiant.name: RadientRedemption
radiant.add_attrs: Regenerate 5% of missing Health each second.

craftable.name: RunaansHurricane
craftable.add_attrs: Attacks grant 3% stacking Attack Damage.

radiant.name: RadientRunaansHurricane

craftable.name: SpearofShojin
craftable.add_attrs: Attacks grant 5 bonus Mana.

radiant.name: RadientSpearofShojin

craftable.name: SteadfastHeart
craftable.add_attrs: Gain 10% Durability. While above 50% Health, instead gain 18% Durability.

radiant.name: RadientSteadfastHeart
radiant.add_attrs: Gain 16% Durability. While above 40% Health, instead gain 30% Durability.

craftable.name: SteraksGage
craftable.add_attrs: At 60% Health, gain a Shield equal to 50% of the wearer's maximum Health that rapidly decays over 5 seconds.

radiant.name: SteraksMegashield
radiant.add_attrs: At 60% Health, gain a Shield equal to 100% of the wearer's maximum Health that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

craftable.name: SunfireCape
craftable.add_attrs:
Gain 8% max Health.

Every 2 seconds, deal 1% Burn and 33% Wound to an enemy within 2 hexes for 10 seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

radiant.name: RadientSunfireCape
radiant.add_attrs:
Gain 12% max Health.

Every 1.5 seconds, deal 2% Burn and 33% Wound to an enemy within 3 hexes for 8 seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: reduces healing received

craftable.name: ThiefsGloves
craftable.add_attrs:
Each round: Equip 2 random items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

radiant.name: RadientThiefsGloves
radiant.add_attrs:
Each round: Equip 2 random Radiant items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

craftable.name: TitansResolve
craftable.add_attrs:
Gain 2% Attack Damage and 2 Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 25 times.

At full stacks, gain 15 Armor and 15 Magic Resist, and gain immunity to crowd control.

radiant.name: RadientTitansResolve
radiant.add_attrs:
Gain 3% Attack Damage and 3 Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 25 times.

At full stacks, gain 40 Armor and 40 Magic Resist, and gain immunity to crowd control.

craftable.name: VoidStaff
craftable.add_attrs:
Attacks and Ability damage 30% shred the target for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

radiant.name: RadientStatikkShiv
radiant.add_attrs:
Attacks and Ability Damage 30% Shred the target for the rest of combat. This effect does not stack.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

craftable.name: WarmogsArmor
